title: Scp 8642 1
content:
You take a moment to breathe before knocking on the door. Your shirt is tucked, your nametag is in place, your clipboard is at the ready. Mentally you go over everything you’ll need from the department to audit them. After all, best to make sure you get it all now so you don’t have to find your way back to this out-of-the-way nook. Confidently, you raise your hand up and…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/5 You knock on the door.]||= 1||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/2 You don’t knock on the door.]||

author: TopHatBionicle
